name: Rody
text: On Play: If your leader has the "Minks" type, and your opponents has 7 or more rested cards, KO up to one of your opponent's cost 2 or lower characters.

effect.text: If your leader has the "Minks" type, and your opponents has 7 or more rested cards, KO up to one of your opponent's cost 2 or lower characters.
conditions: your opponents has 7 or more rested cards

meta.notes: Card has a 'SAMPLE' watermark, which is not part of the card's official text. The rarity is 'UC' as printed in the bottom right corner.
